alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 6:33AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Walker and west central Jefferson Counties through 700 AM CST... At 632 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bankhead Lock And Dam, or 19 miles northeast of Holt, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cordova, Dora, Maytown, West Jefferson, Gorgas Steam Plant, Gorgas, Goodsprings, Barney, Birmingport, Miller Steam Plant, Tutwiler and Little Shoal. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
